00015 DbjTestTupleIterator::DbjTestTupleIterator(Uint32 numTuples) :
00016         numT(numTuples),counter(0) {
00017 };

00020 DbjErrorCode DbjTestTupleIterator::getNextTuple(DbjTuple *&tuple){
00021     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00022     if (tuple != NULL) {
00023         delete tuple;
00024     }
00025     char str[DBJ_DIGITS_OF_TYPE(counter)+2] = {'\0'};
00026     sprintf(str, "A" DBJ_FORMAT_UINT32,counter);
00027     DBJ_TRACE_STRING(1,str);
00028     tuple = new DbjTestTuple(counter++,str);
00029 
00030     DBJ_SET_ERROR(DBJ_SUCCESS);
00031     return DbjGetErrorCode();
00032 };
00033 
00034 
00035 bool DbjTestTupleIterator::hasNext() const {
00036     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00037     return (counter < numT);
00038 }; 
00039 
00040 DbjErrorCode DbjTestTupleIterator::reset() {
00041     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00042     counter = 0;
00043     
00044     DBJ_SET_ERROR(DBJ_SUCCESS);
00045     return DbjGetErrorCode();
00046 };
00047 
00048 bool DbjTestTupleIterator::isResetable() const {
00049     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00050     return true;
00051 };

00053 DbjErrorCode DbjTestTupleIterator::getTable(DbjTable *&table) {
00054     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00055     DBJ_SET_ERROR(DBJ_SUCCESS);
00056     table = NULL;
00057     return DbjGetErrorCode();
00058 };
